doc.title: Barn Yarns
doc.plot: Felix tries to grub a meal at a diner but is chased away when he's sprayed with pepper. Next he chases a duck that he thinks will make a good meal, but the duck winds up saving Felix's life when he almost drowns in a pond. He than helps the duck avoid the dinner table of a local farmer, and after the farmer throws Felix back in the pond, Felix plots his revenge with the help of the fish in the pond.
